title: Schindler's List
oscars_won_details: Best Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

title: The Piano
description: In the mid-19th century, a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

title: Groundhog Day
description: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day, and the day keeps repeating until he gets it right.

title: The Fugitive
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role (Tommy Lee Jones)
description: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: Philadelphia
description: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
description: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

title: Dazed and Confused
description: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

title: True Romance
description: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

title: Tombstone
description: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

title: Mrs. Doubtfire
description: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

title: Sleepless in Seattle
description: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

title: In the Name of the Father
description: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
description: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

title: Carlito's Way
description: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead a better life outside of NYC.

title: A Bronx Tale
description: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

title: The Remains of the Day
description: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

title: The Age of Innocence
description: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

title: Short Cuts
description: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents blend and intertwine during the weeks leading up to a massive earthquake.

title: Falling Down
description: An unemployed defense worker, frustrated with the various flaws he sees in modern society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

title: Three Colors: Blue
description: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

title: Menace II Society
description: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

title: The Sandlot
description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

title: Hocus Pocus
description: A curious youngster moves to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.

title: Addams Family Values
description: The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved Uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.

title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses involving a new vigilante assassin.

title: Demolition Man
description: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

title: Cliffhanger
description: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

title: The Firm
description: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

title: Last Action Hero
description: With the help of a magic ticket, a young film fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action film character.

title: Much Ado About Nothing
description: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

title: Searching for Bobby Fischer
description: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

title: Dave
description: An uncanny Presidential lookalike named Dave is recruited by the Secret Service to become a temporary stand-in for the President of the United States.

title: Six Degrees of Separation
description: An affluent New York couple finds their lives touched, intruded upon, and compelled by a mysterious young black man who is never quite who he says he is.

title: Farewell My Concubine
description: Two stars in a Beijing opera troupe and the woman who comes between them endure the political turmoil of 20th-century China.

title: Naked
description: Johnny flees Manchester for London to avoid a beating from the family of a girl he has raped. There, he encounters a series of characters and situations that test his nihilistic worldview.

title: Shadowlands
description: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer, and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham from the U.S.

title: The Joy Luck Club
description: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

title: Benny & Joon
description: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

title: Cronos
description: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

title: Rudy
description: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

title: Cool Runnings
description: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

title: The Secret Garden
description: A young British girl born and raised in India loses her neglectful parents in an earthquake. She is returned to England to live at her uncle's estate, where she discovers a hidden garden.

title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
description: A dramatized biographical account of the life and career of the martial arts superstar Bruce Lee.

title: What's Love Got to Do with It
description: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

title: Grumpy Old Men
description: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

title: The Pelican Brief
description: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

title: Manhattan Murder Mystery
description: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife dies suddenly.

title: The Wedding Banquet
description: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.

title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
description: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.
